price: (Rasûlüm!) Âyetlerimizi inkâr eden ve «Muhakkak suretle bana mal ve evlât verilecek» diyen adamı gördün mü?
arabic: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالٗا وَوَلَدًا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afara-ayta alladhī kafara biāyātinā waqāla laūtayanna mālan wawaladan
